Tutorials
============

Here you can find a collection of eemont tutorials in Jupyter Notebooks and RMarkdown files:

- `[001] Masking Clouds and Shadows in Sentinel-2 <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/001-Clouds-and-Shadows-Masking-Sentinel-2.ipynb>`_ 
- `[002] Scaling a Sentinel-2 Image Collection <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/002-Sentinel-2-Image-Collection-Scaling.ipynb>`_ 
- `[003] Getting the Closest Image to a Specific Date <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/003-Closest-Image-to-Date-MOD16A2.ipynb>`_ 
- `[004] Computing Spectral Indices on Landsat 8 <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/004-Computing-Spectral-Indices-Landsat-8.ipynb>`_ 
- `[005] Computing the EVI with Overloaded Operators <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/005-EVI-with-Overloaded-Operators-Sentinel-2.ipynb>`_ 
- `[006] Computing NDSI and Snow Cover using Overloaded Operators and Rich Comparisons <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/006-NDSI-and-Snow-Cover-Sentinel-2-MOD10A2.ipynb>`_ 
- `[007] Masking Clouds in Sentinel-3 <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/007-Clouds-Masking-Sentinel-3.ipynb>`_ 
- `[008] Cloudless MOD09Q1 Median Composite <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/008-Cloudless-MOD09Q1-Median-Composite.ipynb>`_ 
- `[009] Using eemont and geemap in R with rgee <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/009-eemont-And-geemap-In-R-With-rgee.Rmd>`_ 
- `[010] Creating Points From Queries <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/010-Creating-Points-From-Queries.ipynb>`_ 
- `[011] Creating a Bounding Box From a Query <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/011-Creating-A-Bounding-Box-From-Query.ipynb>`_ 
- `[012] Computing Spectral Indices on MODIS <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/012-Spectral-Indices-MODIS-MOD09GA.ipynb>`_ 
- `[013] Time Series By Region and Conversion to Pandas <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/013-Time-Series-By-Region-Pandas.ipynb>`_ 
- `[014] Time Series By Regions and Conversion to Pandas <https://github.com/davemlz/eemont/blob/master/tutorials/014-Time-Series-By-Regions-Pandas.ipynb>`_
